attributes.action: introduce a motion calling for the resignation of the Speaker of the House of Commons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As with any senior management position, in Government or business, the overall responsibility of good order and moral compass in the House of Commons is in the hands of the Speaker.

The current speaker has shown himself to be morally inept, by the very nature of his trying to keep secret MP's expenses, including his own, even going to law at the tax payer's expense also by not recognising the mood of the country.

He appears to be trying to ensure his own financial and political future - this is not acceptable and just further damages the mother of parliaments and the ethics of our political class.

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
